synopsis.text: There is a city called Neo Kyoto where the card game 'Build Divide' dictates everything from personal disputes to social standing. The King, with unparalleled skills, reigns over the city, and defeating him promises the fulfillment of one's deepest desires. To challenge the King, one must first participate in the Rebuild Battle and complete a challenging task known as the 'Key.' Among the hopefuls is Teruto Kurabe, a young man driven by a long-cherished wish. With the enigmatic Sakura Banka by his side, Teruto embarks on a journey that will change the fate of Neo Kyoto. As they delve deeper into the Rebuild Battle, Teruto uncovers forgotten memories that question the very essence of the city. Join Teruto and Sakura as they navigate the thrilling world of Build Divide, where battles are fought, friendships are forged, and dreams come true.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
